page.title: 07MID-DEVON ENTERPRISE AGENCY
page.content: The{M.D.E.A.}in Tiverton is run full-time by a manager and an assistant. It is{sponsored by local {firms,}e.g. the brewery, the textile factory, banks, solicitors and small businesses. Situated in the textile factory's grounds, the centre is for people who've been made{redundant}and want to find work, setting up their own business or carrying on with a particular trade. The centre helps all age groups, covering around{60 {different trades,}ranging from scrap metal to businessmen to forestry. Applicants are usually sent on from the{Job Centre.}During the last 12 months 311 people have been interviewed and all have found work. Applicants prefer the{atmosphere}of the{Enterprise Agency}because it is more personal and it is possible to have a one hour interview.
